price: 以前，我确已嘱咐阿丹，而他忘记我的嘱咐，我未发现他有任何决心。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
